publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-603.1 Tommy Sheridan: The Founding Principles of the Parliament-As an amendment to motion (S2M-603) in the name of Iain Smith, insert after "principles for the Parliament", "recognises that the new Parliament includes a number of smaller parties who received 15.1% of the vote and as such that this representation should be reflected in the share of committee places and debating time within the chamber,".
